text: (musalamaanon hasabe jel) auraten tum par haraam kee gayee hain tumhaaree maen (daadee naanee vagairah sab) aur tumhaaree betiyo (potiyo) navaasiyo (vagairah) aur tumhaaree bahanen aur tumhaaree phuphiyo aur tumhaaree khaalaen aur bhateejiyo aur bhanjiyo aur tumhaaree vah maen jinhonne tumako doodh pilaaya hai aur tumhaaree razaee (doodh shareek) bahanen aur tumhaaree beeveeyon kee maane aur vah (maadar zilo) ladakiyaan jo tumhaaree god mein paravarish pa chukee ho aur un auraton (ke pet) se (paida huee) hain jinase tum hamabistaree kar chuke ho haan agar tumane un beeviyon se (sirph nikaah kiya ho) hamabistaree na kee to alabatta un maadarazilon (ladakiyon se) nikaah (karane mein) tum par kuchh gunaah nahin hai aur tumhaare sulabee ladako (poton navaason vagairah) kee beeviyo (bahuen) aur do bahanon se ek saath nikaah karana magar jo ho chuka (vah maaf hai) beshak khuda bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai
